title: Evaluating functions
text: Given the equation for a function, we should replace the input variable in the equation with the value provided and then calculate the result.

title: Replacement
text: Replace the variable $$x$$ with a + $$h$$, and we get $$f{\left(a+h\right)}=\sqrt{2-a+h}+5$$.

title: Simplification
text: Simplify the expression $$\sqrt{2-a+h}+5$$. What do you get?
speech: Simplify the expression  the square root of 2 minus a plus h end root plus 5 . What do you get?
